t2.Target Weakness: ATK rises by 20% and DEF Penetration rises by 200.
t2.Swift and Nimble: Per every sec, Dodge rate is increased by 100. This effect can be stacked up to max 5 times, and resets upon dodging an Attack.
t2.Tactical Foresight: Dodge rate is increased by 200 and takes 10% reduced DMG.
t2.Opportune Strike: Crit Chance is increased by 150 and Crit DMG is increased by 30%.
t2.Vital Detection: Upon attack, causes the target to take 10% increased All DMG and have their ATK Spd reduced by 100 for 10 sec. This effect activates once every 3 sec.
